duties_responsibilities.duty: Weld and fabricate massive steel structures like large steel girders, beams, and nodes for skyscrapers and large power generation equipment.
Perform weld tests including 3 position / 1g, 2, g & 3g , 3 position / ½” Thick carbon steel plates. 1 - Horizontal, 1 – Uphill Vertical & 1 Overhead.
Conduct welding with .045" 70 Series flux cored wire, allowing only stringer weld passes.
Qualify with 3-5 years of industry experience and possess a High School Diploma/GED.
Preferably have NCCER and OSHA 10 certification and pass a pre-employment drug screen.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GEDNCCER certification and OSHA 10 preferred
